This in an informal presentation of [this paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2312.04711) done in collaboration with Mark Newman. 

- Various different applications that we can treat as a hierarchical question
- Elo scores as a popular model for quantifying strengths
- Also talk a bit about luck, and how we might? interpret the presence of a luck component in the animal data sets.
